channel.title: MathJax on Hugo Stellar
channel.description: Recent content in MathJax on Hugo Stellar

item.title: MathJax 支持
item.description: Inline Math # Example$abc$ $e^{\pi i}=-1$ $\frac{3}{2}$$abc$ $e^{\pi i}=-1$ $\frac{3}{2}$ Display Math # Example$$ \sum_{i=1}^{n}\int_{0}^{\pi}\log_2{e^n} $$$$ \sum_{i=1}^{n}\int_{0}^{\pi}\log_2{e^n} $$ Using Latex Codeblock # ``` latex f(n)= \begin{cases} f(n-1)+f(n-2) & n \ge 3 \\ 1 & n=1,2 \end{cases} ``` $$f(n)= \begin{cases} f(n-1)+f(n-2) & n \ge 3 \\ 1 & n=1,2 \end{cases}$$
